    • CourseModule

      public CourseModule(String moduleName, String moduleCode, String lecturers, int numberOfLecHours, int numberOfLabs, int numberOfTutorials)
      Creates the course module object
      Parameters:
      moduleName - the name of the module
      moduleCode - the module code
      lecturers - the module lecturer
      numberOfLecHours - the number of lecture hours required
      numberOfLabs - the number of labs required
      numberOfTutorials - the number of tutorials required
